title: I want to make a React translate Web , How it,s Posible ?
content:
So  first i'll go to Terminal and create a project. 

  • npx create-react-translate-web 
  • cd react-translate-web 
  • npm start
Using the translation library
There are popular libraries i know for translation in React.
  • i18Next (with React i18Next)
  • react-intl
  • Google Translate Api or OpenAI (for dynamic translation)
I am using i18Next. / bash
  • npm install i18next
